timeline.bodyText: Why is this checking whether a subchannel exists, but then the parent uploader url is used?
timeline.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText: We open the sub-channel when it exists on click. On long-click we want to open the parent channel, but only if it has a sub-channel, as you could just click when it doesn't have a sub-channel to open the parent channel.
replies.author: wb9688

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't you also hide subChannelThumb? just to be sure that it is gone, because I think it could happen (i.e. when restoring instance) that handleResult is called twice and with different results, thus possibly resulting in wrongly showing the thumbnail left behind from the previous call. Not sure though if this is really an issue, but this is already the implemented behaviour with uploaderThumb
